module.title: Server: System Log
module.description:
System component for logging and mailing exceptions.
**Features:** list> - stores exceptions into log file - tries to serialize exception - otherwise stores trace - can send mails to one or more mail receivers <list
**Invokation:** code> ... catch( Exception $e ){ $this->env->getCaption()->callHook( 'Server:System', 'logException', $this, array( 'exception' => $e ) ); } ... <code
module.log: Replace file and folder class calls to use CeusMedia:Common.
Adjust file logging and mail generation to standards.
Migration of module Server:Syslog to Server:System:Log as common log component.
module.author: Christian Würker
